title: Travis Scott says fatherhood is 'magical' after Kylie Jenner split
text:
The pair are co-parenting Stormi (Picture: Getty Images for Netflix)

Travis Scott has opened up about fatherhood being the most ‘magical’ experience of his life, after his ex Kylie Jenner revealed she wants more kids.

The rapper, who split from Kylie in early October, gushed about his 1-year-old daughter.

‘Stormi is like a battery. I’ve gotten so much energy from her,’ he said. ‘She has shown me so many things that I never understood. I only got it once she was here.’

The 28-year-old added: ‘Fatherhood is the most impactful thing in my life.’

‘To see your daughter getting a little older every day is the most magical experience in the world,’ he continued to GQ Germany. ‘I’ve also developed so much passion. I feel things I never felt before.’

Despite Travis and Kylie’s shock split after many thought they were set to get married, they’ve made it clear that co-parenting Stormi is their biggest priority.

Advertisement

Advertisement

When the makeup mogul confirmed that the pair had parted ways, she explained on social media: ‘Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi our friendship and our daughter is priority [sic].’

The duo is putting their daughter first and has agreed to have Stormi spend equal time with both parents.

A source told PEOPLE: ‘They have split for now and are living apart. Travis moved out a couple of weeks ago and lives at his own house. Stormi will continue to live with Kylie.

Kylie and Travis split in early October (Picture: FilmMagic)

‘They are both great parents and will co-parent. They don’t want their split to affect Stormi too much.’

Meanwhile, although Butterfly Effect hitmaker previously admitted he initially wanted Stormi to be a boy, he added to Rolling Stone: ‘After a while I was like, “Yo, this might be the illest thing that ever happened.” And when Stormi was born, I was like, “Life is fire, bro.”‘

He said: ‘We don’t let nothing come over Stormi time. Stormi Saturdays. We don’t f*** around with those.

‘Even with me on tour, Stormi pulls up. She’ll travel. She got more stamps on her passport than a lot of motherf***ers.’

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Travis Scott says being father to Stormi is 'magical' after split from Kylie Jenner, who said she wants more kids.
